title: Best of The Herd for 01/27/2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 01/27/2020
description:
Colin reacts to the tragic news of Kobe Bryant's death and talks about what he remembers most about Kobe and his career. He also talks about it with FS1 NBA Analyst Chris Broussard and Jim Jackson who played with and against Kobe in his long NBA career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
